attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239317. Not all storms come to disrupt your life, some come to clear your path! Turn some heads wherever you go and own the day with the famous 2.0L Bi-turbo diesel engine producing 157 kW and 500 Nm. The two turbos work sequentially to deliver massive power and torque, combined with the state-of-the-art 10-speed automatic gearbox. We provide RWC and a 160 multi-point Ford Approved quality check on all of our vehicles for your peace of mind. Call CMH Ford Gezina today to arrange a test drive with any of our professional and friendly sales executives. Any trade-in welcome, we guarantee R10,000 more on any written offer. Easy finance available within 3 hours. The price excludes dealer fees and smash and grab protection film. Errors and omissions Reserved. T&Cs apply.

attributes.title: 2022 Ford Ranger 2.0D Bi-Turbo Stormtrak Auto Double-Cab

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The all-new FIT Hybrid has been engineered to deliver an exceptional blend of strong performance and impressive efficiency. Rather than using a conventional transmission, the FIT Hybrid is equipped with a newly developed Electronically controlled Continuously Variable Transmission (e-CVT) with a single fixed-gear ratio to create a direct connection between moving components. The result is a smooth and reassuring transfer of torque with a linear feel during acceleration across all drive modes. Enhanced Honda SENSING active safety technology, available exclusively on the FIT Hybrid model, offers a broad range of driver assistance features and driver aids as standard. This new and improved Honda SENSING system incorporates a newly developed wider-angle, higher definition front camera that is able to detect a more comprehensive range of road surfaces and traffic characteristics, including enhanced night-time operation. Warranty ‚Äì 8-year / 200,000km (covering components such as battery, PCU, electrical system etc.), 4-Year 60,000 km  Service plan & 3 Years AA Roadside Assist.
